title: yamech
author: yamech
created_time: October 04, 2022, 10:09:16 PMLast edit: December 01, 2022, 07:07:06 PM by yamech
content: GameGuru, the First Crypto Marketplace for eGift cards and Digital Gaming ProductsGameGuru aims to be the first crypto marketplace for eGift cards and digital gaming products. Digital card sales are a multi-billion-dollar industry with massive growth expectation: a turnover of $698.2 billion is expected worldwide in 2024. (Source : https://cdn.mageplaza.com/media/general/US3y9Xa.png)We have been in the e-gift cards business for many years as a vendor in various online marketplaces and we have seen the many limitations of the current system. Traditional marketplaces offer overpriced products, fraudulently obtained game keys (Labelled ‚ÄúGrey Marketplaces‚Äù) and, in most cases, none-instant delivery due to the high-risk of chargebacks and payment reversals.GameGuru, by relying on its own GGT token (BEP-20) as the only payment method, will be able to provide :Lower prices by waiving the commission of marketplaces such as G2A (6 ‚Äì 10% discount). The remaining profit margin (7 ‚Äì 12%) will go to the GGT token holders.Zero-risk products from vetted European wholesale suppliers.Instant goods delivery guaranteed through crypto transactions‚Äô irreversibility and API integration with the suppliers.We are currently working on our whitepaper and the development of the crypto-marketplace. As for the project website, we will launch it the next few days.Regarding the crypto-marketplace, we have already secured one of the biggest European suppliers and have already started integrating their API in the crypto-marketplace.Important Update :Thank you guys for the outstanding support. Our Certik audit is completed : https://www.certik.com/projects/gameguru We have also been listed in Coinmarketcap, Coingecko and we have been in top gainers list for quite a moment. Keep the green candles coming in !Roadmap :- Deployment of contract (October 2022)- Whitepaper and pitch-deck(late October 2022) ¬†WHITEPAPER- Website launch ¬†and marketing efforts (late October 2022) ¬†WEBSITE- Coinmarketcap and Coingecko listing (November 2022) COINMARKETCAP  ¬†COINGECKO- Stage 1 CEX listing (November 2022) BUY HERE- Marketplace launch (Late November 2022) ¬†MARKETPLACE- Stage 2 CEX listing (Q1 2023)GameGuru Tokenomics :Ticker: $GGTNumber of all tokens: 94 000 000 GGT (6M burned)Current price  BUY HERE The total supply will be distributed as follows:- Public Sale : 60% of the total supply- Reserve (Legal, Marketing, Marketplace Dev and operations) : 18% of total supply, vesting 12 months- Team and advisors: 5% of total supply, vesting 24 months- LP Liquidity : 4% of the total supply- Exchange Liquidity: 13% of total supplyContract Address: 0xd2359c576632234d1354b20bf51b0277be20c81eContract Audit: https://www.certik.com/projects/gameguruPoocoin Listing : https://poocoin.app/tokens/0xd2359c576632234d1354b20bf51b0277be20c81eLocked BUSD liquidity (5 years): https://app.unicrypt.network/amm/pancake-v2/pair/0x287bee698EdcD6EbaFD50f520356156836c4e3CdLocked BNB liquidity (5 years): https://app.unicrypt.network/amm/pancake-v2/pair/0xE572F88DB685bD1091eDD2132E2A02c47BBf5115Team tokens vesting (2 years) : https://bscscan.com/tx/0xc64aacae572dd7e94a1eb3cf98d3df179f72927d46f5b8ed00ccc9909fd8bdb3Reserve vesting (1 year) : https://bscscan.com/tx/0x345843ea7677a6a1a9961369a82309158a944d321e5de2f6e9fb463c17101fbcTeam : ¬†KYC Verification Passed !!Yassir Amechghale ‚Üí CEO of GameGuru27 years old food engineer, digital marketer and crypto-enthusiast based in France and MoroccoLinkedinInstagramFacebookAnd many more working in the shadows, to whom I am eternally grateful.Press Releases :Youtube ReviewWhale Coin Talk short AMAUnityVerse Text AMAYahoo FinanceMarketwatchContact us :Please join us in one of our telegram channels for the latest news and updates.Website | Telegram | Discord | Twitter

comments.author: kojektea
comments.body: the roadmap is currently still in the stage of launching a website and marketing, this is still quite new and of course I will see how you will make your marketing plan, for sure it will be very clear with your performance, which CEX is the first in the listing?

comments.author: yamech
comments.body: Quote from: kojektea on October 08, 2022, 06:57:51 PMthe roadmap is currently still in the stage of launching a website and marketing, this is still quite new and of course I will see how you will make your marketing plan, for sure it will be very clear with your performance, which CEX is the first in the listing?Yes we are finishing the whitepaper and the project website as we speak. Regarding the first CEX listing, we have already signed an agreement with Coinsbit.io. So, the listing will happen around late October ‚Äì early November.As for the marketing, we are negotiating with one of the top crypto marketing agencies in the market ( tokensuite.io). We are very invested in this project and will do everything we can to succeed. Unlike other crypto projects with private rounds and huge presales, we're investing our own personal funds into this project.

comments.body: Quote from: kojektea on October 08, 2022, 06:57:51 PMthe roadmap is currently still in the stage of launching a website and marketing, this is still quite new and of course I will see how you will make your marketing plan, for sure it will be very clear with your performance, which CEX is the first in the listing?what is the purpose of your investment there? So you really don't make any sales, do it with your personal money?is it just a promotional service you are interested in making an investment, I think there are more ways for promotional services without having to burn more money

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: By e-Gift cards, do you mean similar to those cards like physical ones from Steam, or Xbox Game Pass for example?

comments.author: yamech
comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on October 09, 2022, 06:04:40 PMBy e-Gift cards, do you mean similar to those cards like physical ones from Steam, or Xbox Game Pass for example?E-gift cards can be anything from PlayStation Network Gift Cards, Xbox Live Gift Cards, Razor Gold, Roblox, Blizard to Netflix, Uber eats, Domino's Pizza or DoorDash gift cards.https://www.g2a.com/fr/category/gift-cards-c6https://www.g2a.com/fr/category/gaming-c1513https://www.g2a.com/fr/category/subscriptions-c938
